content.question: Structural unemployment is best described as unemployment arising from

choices.label: the elimination of jobs as a result of technological change
an increase in the number of workers searching for better-paying jobs
an increase in the number of jobs demanding unskilled labor
the temporary reduction of jobs during a downturn in the business cycle
the reduction in jobs due to seasonal changes in demand

content.answer: the elimination of jobs as a result of technological change
